title: Marie Claire Serif font
content:
Whats the name of this beautyfull serif font used in Marie Claire

comments.content:

It is a beauty...
Yep... been there... ITs a bit expensive but thank god it has croatian charactesr... Its so good that they are making all new fonts in otf format...
